description: This file defines a state management store for notes within a Vue.js application using Pinia. It includes a type definition for Note objects and provides functions to fetch, create, update, and delete notes via API calls.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches an array of notes, optionally filtered by category ID, and updates the store state.

methods.name: fetchNote
methods.description: Fetches a single note by its ID.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with provided data and adds it to the store.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: async function deleteNote(id: number) { deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID and updates the store state accordingly.
